name: Pi-Roulette Arcade Arena
description:
Latest version: v1

This is a simple game made in a couple of hours for the #PiDayJam 2015.

The idea is simple: various aspects of the game are determined by the digits of Pi. This includes things like your character's health, walking speed, and the number of enemies.

Goal:

Collect all the coins and stay alive!

Instructions

  • Arrow Keys to move.
  • Spacebar to shoot (watch your ammo!)
  • Collect all the coins to win.
  • Try not to get hurt by enemies.
  • All properties of the game are randomized based on the digits of Pi.
